content: crochet pet bed tessa melanie bloss crochet emoclew hello friend welcome to my little corner of the crochet world thank you so much for choosing this pattern and for supporting my creative journey crochet has been my passion and therapy for over 37 years and i m thrilled to share it with you my designs reflect my love for the dark and unique and they come to life with the help of my constant companions my baby kitties my biggest inspiration and cheerleaders i like to think of my work as not your grandma s crochet quirky bold and always a bit unexpected whether you re a fellow crochet nerd like me or just discovering the joy of stitching i hope you find as much comfort and excitement in this pattern as i did in creating it i d love to see your finished creations share them with me on social media using #melanieblosscrochet if you have any questions feel free to reach out i m here to help you can contact me at melanieblosscrochet@gmail com thank you again for supporting my work always remember you are loved beyond belief happy creating melanie © 2025 - melanie bloss | melanie bloss crochet™ | tessa 01 all rights reserved this pattern is the creation of melanie bloss
